name: The Maze (itch) (Okau)
description:
Made for the 210th Trijam, with the theme of 'Distraction' in 02:58:41
Dev note: I didn't run out of time for the art, it's supposed to look like that. However, what I did run out of time for was a way to balance the difficulty of the game, so it's a bit hard. It's also possible to die during transitions. There is also only 8 level layouts, one a little bigger than the rest, so it is possible that you will get the same level multiple times. This is an infinite highscore game, and does not save your score.

Known Bugs: The button on the Game Over screen does work, although not in the export. Not sure why, but 1 minute won't be enough time to work it out. Also, an exclamation mark should appear when an enemy spots you, although sometimes it doesn't.

The Maze is a game where you traverse a shadowy maze teeming with enemies. Use your lures to distract them, and search for the key to unlock the door.

Controls:
Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys
Shoot lure/Select - Left Mouse Button

Music: Science Music - TimTaj (freemusicarchive)
